Enums/EPXProximityObserverError.html.name: EPXProximityObserverError
Enums/EPXProximityObserverError.html.abstract: Possible errors invoked with Proximity Observer’s error block.

Classes/EPXProximityZoneContext.html#/c:.name: deviceIdentifier
Classes/EPXProximityZoneContext.html#/c:.abstract: Identifier of a device that is the zone’s source.

Classes/EPXProximityZoneContext.html#/c:.name: tag
Classes/EPXProximityZoneContext.html#/c:.abstract: Tag assigned in Cloud to that zone’s source.

Classes/EPXProximityZoneContext.html#/c:.name: attachments
Classes/EPXProximityZoneContext.html#/c:.abstract: Dictionary of attachments assigned in Cloud to that zone’s source.

Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.name: range
Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Range where the action should be reported.

Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.name: tag
Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Tag assigned in Cloud to that zone.

Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.name: onEnter
Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Register block to be called when user enters proximity of Estimote devices with matching tag.

Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.name: onExit
Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Block to be called when user exits proximity of Estimote devices with matching tag.

Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.name: onContextChange
Classes/EPXProximityZone.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Block to be called each time a new beacon is detected in user’s range and each time a beacon disappears

Classes/EPXProximityRange.html#/c:objc(c.name: desiredMeanTriggerDistance
Classes/EPXProximityRange.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Distance in meters where enter/exit events should occur passed in initializer rounded to decimeters (to 0.1).

Classes/EPXProximityRange.html#/c:objc(c.name: nearRange
Classes/EPXProximityRange.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Convenience factory for near range. Returns range with meanTriggerDistance set to 1m.

Classes/EPXProximityRange.html#/c:objc(c.name: farRange
Classes/EPXProximityRange.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Convenience factory for far range. Returns range with meanTriggerDistance set to 5m.

Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.name: defaultConfiguration
Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.abstract: Creates a default Proximity Observer configuration object, which has EPXLogLevelWarning logs level, and enabled both requesting Core Location authorization and telemetry reporting.

Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.name: logLevel
Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.abstract: Logger level. Defines which logs generated by Estimote Proximity SDK are printed to the Xcode’s console.

Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.name: requestsCLAuthorization
Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.abstract: Indicates if SDK should request Core Location’s authorization.

Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.name: telemetryReportingEnabled
Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.abstract: Indicates if full telemetry data will be reported to the Cloud.

Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.name: +customWithLogLevel:requestsCLAuthorization:telemetryReportingEnabled:
Classes/EPXProximityObserverConfiguratio.abstract: Convenience intializer for creating a custom configuration.

Classes/EPXProximityObserver.html#/c:obj.name: -initWithCredentials:onError:
Classes/EPXProximityObserver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Convenience initializer. Calls designated initializer with default configuration.

Classes/EPXProximityObserver.html#/c:obj.name: -startObservingZones:
Classes/EPXProximityObserver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Start observing and calling callbacks on provided proximity zones:

Classes/EPXProximityObserver.html#/c:obj.name: -stopObservingZones
Classes/EPXProximityObserver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Stop observing and calling callbacks for all zones that were provided with -startObservingZones:,

Classes/EPXCloudCredentials.html.name: EPXCloudCredentials
Classes/EPXCloudCredentials.html.abstract: Estimote Cloud credentials encapsulated in a value object. To acquire App ID & App Token go to

Classes/EPXProximityObserver.html.name: EPXProximityObserver
Classes/EPXProximityObserver.html.abstract: Observes and reports proximity of Estimote devices.

Classes/EPXProximityRange.html.name: EPXProximityRange
Classes/EPXProximityRange.html.abstract: Represents range of a proximity where enter/exit events should occur.

Classes/EPXProximityZone.html.name: EPXProximityZone
Classes/EPXProximityZone.html.abstract: Represents a logical zone. Is represented by range from a beacon and its tag.

Classes/EPXProximityZoneContext.html.name: EPXProximityZoneContext
Classes/EPXProximityZoneContext.html.abstract: Interface providing all contextual data about a Proximity Zone.
